lines.text: If she's in trouble, she'll scream.
Beautiful Miami! We start out lookin' for fish and end up looking at oranges.
What do you do down there?
What are you givin' me? An alligator don't know a half-nelson from a toe-hold.
It's the unexpected things in life that give it spice.
Look, bud, I got an honest face, ain't I?
Look, senor, the best thing I can say about it is it's a face.
Boy, that Goldie character slays me! Monkeys got more brains in their tails than he's got in his head.
Boy, if I ever get to be an old man, it'll be a miracle.
Boss, if I might be so bold as to mention it... no dames!
You've been skating on ice for a long time. I knew it would break under you some day.
